title: "New 2D tags, AI authentication may spot counterfeit products more accurately"
excerpt: "The authentication process takes under 3.5 minutes to complete, and involves scanning the tags under an electronic microscope to obtain the PUF pattern, which is sent to the AI-driven software for validation."
